metadata.Title: CVE-2022-23825 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description: Aliases in the branch predictor may cause some AMD processors to predict the wrong branch type potentially leading to information disclosure.

notes.Note: sbeattie> related to Retbleed, likely addressed in that patch series. cascardo> general BTC, addressed with IBPB and BTC_NO

criterions.comment: linux package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-allwinner package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.

linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life, was needs-triage').
